# check-es-compat

> CLI tool for checking JavaScript code compatibility with target browsers and Node.js versions

```bash
$ npx check-es-compat .
```

```
// .browserslistrc
Chrome >= 64
Firefox >= 58
```

<!--- Absolute link, in order to work from NPM website --->
